name: Messengers: Iah - Out Of Time
description:
Made in 48 hours for GDJam 2022 

Theme: Out of time

Help the people of the city evacuate to the three areas marked in green. 

You will automatically pick up up to 4 at a time once you get close.

Controls

A,W,S,D: Move

LeftShift: Descend

Space: Ascend

Esc: Pause
